Dancing 
 Mary Nabire and Tesa Welch
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I dance when I am hapy, 
 
 I dance when I am sad, 
 
 I dance when I am lonely, 
 
 I dance when I am mad. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My teacher says, 
 
 “Sit stil! 
 
 Don’t dance about al day.” 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But my mother says, 
 
 “Dancing makes you 
 
 healthy, 
 
 Dancing makes you tal, 
 
 One day you’l be a dancer, 
 
 And surprise them al!” 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And I say, 
 
 “One day 
 
 I’l dance and people wil 
 
 pay 
 
 Just to se me leap and 
 
 twirl. 
 
 ‘Her dancing is SO god,’ 
 
 they’l say.”
